sentences.en: It may be stating the obvious, but most teleworking at present is connected with computers.
sentences.cn: 这一点或许人人皆知，但当前大部分远程办公都离不开计算机。

sentences.en: Teleworking has many benefits. With fewer cars on the road, traffic and air quality improve.
sentences.cn: 电子通勤有许多好处. 路上的汽车会变少, 交通和空气品质都会改善.

sentences.en: This way of working is called telecommuting or teleworking.
sentences.cn: 这种工作方式称之为远程办公或远程工作.

sentences.en: What is the benefits and drawbacks of teleworking?
sentences.cn: 远程办公的优缺点是什么？

sentences.en: When I first started teleworking from Dallas to Palo Alto in 1997, I was almost always the only remote person in the meetings I attended.
sentences.cn: 当我第一次开始远程电话会议时，还是在1997年，从Dallas到Palo Alto。 在参加的那些会议中，我几乎总是唯一的远程参会者。
